item.title: Preparing to cross the limit of the world
item.description: Everything around us is both real and unreal, it is not about the existance of the world but the nature of our perception. One thing that do reveal the mystery of this so called “world” is our intention, it may affect things in an unpredicatable way. The night always tells the truth. But who cares? I want to write about the irradiation of the giant eagle, however I can’t. The only mission of us is to escape from the giant eagle when we are alive and travel into the third attention.
